environmental.title: Environmental information
environmental.rohs_under_review_info:
We are currently working with the manufacturer to update the RoHS status of this product.
If you need more information, please contact the local sales team on info@distrelec.com
environmental.rohs_not_compliant_info:
This article is only intended for specific applications which are detailed in Article 2, paragraph 4 of the RoHS directive.

Please refer to the RoHS directive for specific details and exclusions for your application.
environmental.rohs_not_applicable_info: This article falls outside the scope of the RoHS Directive
environmental.dangerous: This product is classified as Dangerous Goods, which may influence the delivery terms and conditions.
environmental.bulky: This product's weight or dimensions may influence the delivery terms and conditions.
environmental.role_error: Apologies, you cannot perform this task online, please contact our team at {{emailAddress}} who will assist you.
